content: just over a year ago i knitted a blanket named harvey and if you ve been a follower of mine for a while you ll remember that i enjoyed the style so much i later knitted another similar blanket named taylor it turns out two blankets wasn t enough and so this summer i knitted gracie and i m so excited to share her with you all this pattern combines garter stitch my favourite with a textured panel that uses a play on seed stitch to create a really lovely textured panel i ve chosen to knit my blanket in a nice bright bubble gum pink but you could pick any colour and i m confident it ll work just as well
